game.name: Breaching Harkon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 침투하고, 업그레이드하며, 혼돈을 unleashed 하는 로그라이크 슈터에서 매 판마다 새로운 총격전 가능성을 만들어 보세요. 독특한 부착물을 쌓고, 파괴적인 무기 조합을 만들어, 무자비한 범죄 제국과의 폭발적인 총격전에 뛰어드십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Breach, upgrade, and unleash chaos in this roguelike shooter where every run builds new gunplay possibilities. Stack wild attachments, forge broken weapon combos, and dive into explosive firefights against a ruthless criminal empire.
